message.body: Hey Hunter how's things? Hey if you ever need an extra set of hands or need drawings made or anything like that stuff we talked about a while back, let me know. I've got a lot of free time since I got back from my trips so I'm looking to work again in a variety of capacities. Hope yr good.

Hey Chris. I actually basically quit my job. I might still be able to get u some random work, but I have some ideas for monetizing my art and potentially yours if u want to discuss. Your expertise in pre-print would actually be crucial. Let's meet up. I think I am mostly free Tuesday through Thursday this week
btw I am pretty good at illustrator now after taking a class on it

Always up to meet up yeah. I've had a lot of ideas about monetizing my art lately too. My recent trips to China and the Middle East opened my eyes a lot. Let's get a coffee tomorrow. That's rad that the illustrator class worked out! It's so helpful.
